header.description: Read & Share Posts in your own neighborhood on a pinboard based on your location
header.type-address: Type your address to find out... (Address, City, State or ZIP Code)
header.why-join-details-part1: connects you with the people around you, and lets you share anything you want with them!
header.why-join-details-part2: It’s your local pinboard, tailored to your location. Who knew that your neighbors were so useful ;)
header.facebook-signups-line1: We just ask for your basic details.
header.facebook-signups-line3: We will never post ANYTHING on your behalf, unless you ask for it.
header.why-join-details-cta: Join NOW, spread your posts around, and create a happier environment!

post.title: Title
post.example: e.g. Xinhai Rd. Taipei, Taiwan. - Then Click 'Go'
post.location-title: Where do you want to post?

messages.public_whatis: switch to Public so everybody will see your comment
messages.private_whatis: switch to Private to expose your comment to the poster of this post only

fileuploader.typeError: {file} has invalid extension. Only {extensions} are allowed.
fileuploader.sizeError: {file} is too large, maximum file size is {sizeLimit}.
fileuploader.minSizeError: {file} is too small, minimum file size is {minSizeLimit}.
fileuploader.emptyError: {file} is empty, please select files again without it.
fileuploader.onLeave: The files are being uploaded, if you leave now the upload will be cancelled.

errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Ooops... Couldn't get your location. Please click 'Change' to try again or to set it manually
errors.PERMISSION_DENIED: Ooops... Please Allow Location Tracking from Settings and 'Try Again' or click 'Change' to set it manually
errors.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE: Ooops... Position Unavailable. We coudlnt get your location. Please click 'Change' to set it manually
errors.PASSWORD_ERROR: Password invalid. Password must be 6-18 of letters, numbers, underscores or hyphens.
errors.NOT_ACTIVATED_OR_WRONG_PASSWORD: User/Password Incorrect or Account not Activated.
errors.BROWSER_NO_SUPPORT: Your browser doesn't support it... please type your address manually...

login.success-line1:
Only one step seperates you from creating a
happier environment !
login.success-line2: We would like to verify your email:
login.success-line3: Please check your mailbox and click on the activation link we've sent you.
login.success-line4: If you do not receive an email from us within 30 minutes, please check your email's spam and junk filters, or contact us at
